biotools.summary: ENT is a highly scalable genotype phasing algorithm based on entropy minimization. ENT is capable of phasing both unrelated and related genotypes coming from complex pedigrees.

bioschemas.name: ENT
bioschemas.summary: ENT is a highly scalable genotype phasing algorithm based on entropy minimization. ENT is capable of phasing both unrelated and related genotypes coming from complex pedigrees.
